title: Precise estimates for certain distances in $\mathbb{R}^d$
abstract:
We provide sharp estimates for the intrinsic distances of Finsler metrics
with precise boundary estimates. These metrics include the Kobayashi-Hilbert
metric near strongly convex points, the minimal metric near convex and strongly
minimally convex points, and the $k$-quasi hyperbolic metric in $k$-strongly
convex domains.
  Finally, we prove a characterization result in convex geometry for the
$k$-quasi hyperbolic metric.
